meanings.definition: A large, round-bottomed cooking pan used in Chinese cuisine.
meanings.sent1: My mom used the wok to stir-fry vegetables for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chef tossed the noodles in the wok to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent3: The wok on the stove looked like a giant bowl ready to cook a feast.
meanings.sent4: The sizzle of the ingredients in the wok filled the kitchen with tempting aromas.
meanings.sent5: The shiny wok gleamed under the kitchen lights, waiting to be used for cooking.

meanings.definition: To cook food in a wok.
meanings.sent1: I wok my favorite stir-fry recipe every Friday night.
meanings.sent2: She loves to wok chicken with vegetables for a quick and tasty meal.
meanings.sent3: When in doubt, just wok it out in the kitchen!
meanings.sent4: The chef expertly woked the ingredients, creating a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle and aroma when you wok food is always so inviting.
